item.title: Learning golang for bioinformatics
item.description: What is Go? Go, or “golang” is a compiled language that was developped at Google in 2009. Golang is an open source language designed for simplicity, and portability within modern computational infrastructures. Golang is statically typed. In practice this means defining the types of variables, and explicitly keeping track of how those types are passed into and out of functions. Hello World in go looks like this: package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.
